CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(End_Date__c), TEXT(Year( TODAY() )- Year( Start_Date__c )) &" "&"years"&" "& TEXT(Month( TODAY() )-Month( Start_Date__c )) &" "&"months"&" "& TEXT(Day( TODAY() )-Day( Start_Date__c ))&" "&"days", TEXT(Year( End_Date__c )- Year( Start_Date__c )) &" "&"years"&" "& TEXT(Month( End_Date__c )-Month( Start_Date__c )) &" "&"months"&" "& TEXT(Day( End_Date__c )-Day( Start_Date__c ))&" "&"days")
CustomField.label: YoS
